Vibed Design System (LLM entrypoint)

Primary guide:
- ./LLM_USAGE.md

Repository:
- https://github.com/cr0cK/vibed-design-system

Main package:
- @vibed/design-system

Examples and docs sources:
- ./apps/storybook/src/stories/documentation
- ./apps/storybook/src/stories/atoms
- ./apps/storybook/src/stories/molecules
- ./apps/storybook/src/stories/organisms

Quick usage pattern:
1. Wrap app with DesignSystemProvider.
2. Prefer Box/Stack/Inline/Grid for layout.
3. Use semantic props/tokens and controlSize variants.
4. Reuse molecules/organisms before custom implementations.
